title: Notable Changes in the Text of Isaiah
html:
Nephi quoted Isaiah 13in its entirety (see 2 Nephi 23), but it is somewhat different from the King James text. The most significant differences are found in verses 3, 8, and 22. Compare the two versions carefully to see what has been lost from the King James Version.

LDS Church Educational System Old Testament Student Manual, 1 Kings–Malachi, Religion 302, Chapter 14, Item 3
